data.eml:eml: A new variety of Didymocarpus (Gesneriaceae) from Guangdong, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xu, Wen-Jing, Qin *, Wei-Hua, Wang, Zi-Qi, Li, Zhong-Lin, Fu, Long-Fei, Hong, Xin (2019): A new variety of Didymocarpus (Gesneriaceae) from Guangdong, China. PhytoKeys 128: 33-38, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.128.35446, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.128.35446
